channel.title: [*] Help with anti spam/syi [*]
channel.description:
Hello! Please help me.
How de heck can i add anti spam/syi/null to my server? I would really appreciate if someone out there could help little me..
:)

item.title: [*] Help with anti spam/syi [*]
item.dc:creator: @99range_k0 99range k0
item.description:
@99range_k0 wrote:

Do you mean like make where nulls and SYI’s can’t connect? If so heres the solution if you have a 317(may work with others…
Go into client.java and at the top under

public int kickTimer = 1;

put/edit this.

public void badNames() { if(playerName.contains("~") || playerName.contains("!") || playerName.contains("@") || playerName.contains("#") || playerName.contains("$") || playerName.contains("%") || playerName.contains("^") || playerName.contains("&") || playerName.contains("SYI") || playerName.contains("*") || playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains(".") || playerName.contains("/") || playerName.contains(",") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains(">") || playerName.contains("<") || playerName.contains("admin") || playerName.contains("owner") || playerName.contains("Admin") || playerName.contains("}") || playerName.contains("{") || playerName.contains("]") || playerName.contains("[") || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("__") || playerName.contains("___") || playerName.contains("____") || playerName.contains("_____") || playerName.contains("SYI") || playerName.contains("]") || playerName.contains("[") || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("__") || playerName.contains("___") || playerName.contains("____") || playerName.contains("_____") || playerName.contains("SYI") || playerName.contains("SYIpkpker") || playerName.contains("null") || playerName.contains("fuck") || playerName.contains("bitch")) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "@red@"+playerName+" Has been banned for having illgel characters."; disconnected = true; appendToBanned(playerName); checkbannedusers(); } }
Thats the code I use, will autoban any nulls and SYI’s. And it also bans people who put cuss words in their name and stuff. You can edit that out by messin around with the code.
If the person is constantly joining and makin new accounts the solution is go to
characters>one of the names they have used>
Then it should say character-lastconnection = ip
Copy the ip and put it in > data > bannedips. Then that person is ip banned!

Read full topic
